name: My Sexy Fantasy Adventure_00_02
description:
[Note] Hello all! I am your SideChick. This is my second version of the game. Please tell me what you think?

[Added] - Quest Cook's Assisant

[Discription] 'My Sexy Fantasy Adventure' is a roleplay adventure game. 
In this game I will include various quests and tasks to complete. If you have any ideas for the game, feel free to share and I will see what I can do.
It is more like 'Your Sexy Fantasy Adventure'.

[Credits] Art - SideChick Tilesets - Sidechick
